flawed_nl_solution:
Each employee needs $35000-$20000=$<<35000-20000=15000>>15000 more per year.
In total, Emily needs to pay $15000*10=$<<15000*10=15000>>15000 extra.
Emily will need to have a new salary of $1000000-$15000=$<<1000000-15000=985000>>985000 per year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 150000, not 15000. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
